Package com.iota.iri.service.tipselection.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CumulativeWeightCalculator
    Implementation of RatingCalculator that gives the cumulative for each transaction referencing entryPoint.
    CumulativeWeightMemCalculator
    Implementation of RatingCalculator that gives the cumulative for each transaction referencing entryPoint.
    CumulativeWeightWithEdgeCalculator
    Used to create a weighted random walks.
    CumWeightScore  
    EntryPointSelectorImpl
    Implementation of EntryPointSelector that given a depth N, returns a N-deep milestone.
    EntryPointSelectorKatz
    This is different from the traditional entry point selector, because it ignores the milestone.
    KatzCentrality  
    RatingOne
    Implementation of RatingCalculator that gives a uniform rating of 1 to each transaction.
    TailFinderImpl
    Implementation of TailFinder that given a transaction hash finds the tail of the associated bundle.
    TipSelectorConflux
    Implementation of TipSelector that selects 2 tips, based on Conflux total order and MCMC
    TipSelectorImpl
    Implementation of TipSelector that selects 2 tips, based on cumulative weights and transition function alpha.
    WalkerAlpha
    Implementation of Walker that performs a weighted random walk with e^(alpha*Hy) as the transition function.
    WalkValidatorImpl
    Implementation of WalkValidator that checks consistency of the ledger as part of validity checks.
    WalkValidatorNull
    Do not do any validation for speed purpose.
